typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		asin as string,
		title as string,
		price as double,
		imUrl as string,
		related as (also_bought as string[], also_viewed as string[], bought_together as string[]),
		salesRank as ({Toys & Games} as string),
		brand as string,
		categories as string[][]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(categories, categories),
	mapColumn(
		categories,
		product_id = asin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
source1 foldDown(unroll(related.also_viewed, related.also_viewed),
	mapColumn(
		related = related.also_viewed,
		product_id = asin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
source1 foldDown(unroll(related.also_bought, related.also_bought),
	mapColumn(
		asin,
		title,
		price,
		imUrl,
		related = related.also_bought,
		salesRank,
		brand
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
source1 foldDown(unroll(related.bought_together),
	mapColumn(
		asin,
		bought_together = related.bought_together
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten4
Flatten2, Flatten4 join(Flatten2@asin == Flatten4@asin,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Flatten3, Flatten1 join(Flatten3@product_id == Flatten1@product_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		asin = Flatten2@asin,
		title,
		price,
		imUrl,
		related,
		salesRank,
		brand,
		asin = Flatten4@asin,
		bought_together
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		related,
		product_id = Flatten3@product_id,
		categories,
		product_id = Flatten1@product_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 join(asin == product_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
source1 foldDown(unroll(related.also_bought),
	mapColumn(
		salesRank
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten5
Join3 sink(input(
		product_id as string,
		title as string,
		price as decimal(18,1),
		imUrl as string,
		related as string,
		salesRank as string,
		brand as string,
		categories as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
